name: Remnith
description: Remnith is a chaotic FPS where enemy units feed off of the energy of every shot that isn't lodged directly into them. The more you miss the stronger they get.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel G3930 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450, Radeon HD 5750, or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: These are the minimum specs required for the desktop version. To play in VR you'll need the recommended specs.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or equivilent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: These are the minimum specs required to play in VR.
